医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
首创的激素替代疗法可改善肾上腺疾病患者的症状首创的激素替代疗法更接近地复制激素的自然昼夜节律和超昼夜节律，已证明可以改善肾上腺疾病患者的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/First-of-its-kind-hormone-replacement-therapy-improves-symptoms-in-病人-with-adrenal-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/First-of-its-kind-hormone-replacement-therapy-improves-symptoms-in-病人-with-adrenal-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e516f9a-514d-4a5c-a25e-b5cd47ceee3e Thu, 19 Oct 2023 22:12:31 -0400 First-of-its kind hormone replacement therapy improves symptoms in patients with adrenal conditions
对美容服务人员日常健康挑战的新见解美国的美容服务微商行业——；例如全国各地的小型独立美甲沙龙；规模庞大，年销售额超过 620 亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/New-insights-into-daily-health-challenges-faced-by-beauty-service-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/New-insights-into-daily-health-challenges-faced-by-beauty-service-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=076e69ac-ab38-48dd-8d01-3a445dc2507c Thu, 19 Oct 2023 22:01:07 -0400 New insights into daily health challenges faced by beauty service workers
加州大学旧金山分校痴呆症专家将与同行一起参加年度阿尔茨海默病临床试验会议来自加州大学旧金山分校的痴呆症专家将于 10 月 24 日至 27 日与来自世界各地的同行一起参加在波士顿举行的年度阿尔茨海默病临床试验 (CTAD) 会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/UCSF-dementia-experts-to-join-peers-at-annual-Clinical-Trials-on-Alzheimers-disease-conference.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/UCSF-dementia-experts-to-join-peers-at-annual-Clinical-Trials-on-Alzheimers-disease-conference.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4a24490-bc86-4eef-878c-29044de4079a Thu, 19 Oct 2023 21:46:34 -0400 UCSF dementia experts to join peers at annual Clinical Trials on Alzheimer's disease conference
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 继续支持麻省大学陈和麻省大学洛厄尔分校的护理点技术计划麻省大学陈医学院和麻省大学洛厄尔分校获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 颁发的 890 万美元奖金，以表彰其推动家庭和护理点医疗技术发展的倡议的再次支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/NIH-renews-support-for-UMass-Chan-and-UMass-Lowelle28099s-point-of-care-technology-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/NIH-renews-support-for-UMass-Chan-and-UMass-Lowelle28099s-point-of-care-technology-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0de5b4f4-6c2b-4291-bfef-f3a3f7336842 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 21:36:40 -0400 NIH renews support for UMass Chan and UMass Lowell’s point-of-care technology initiative
研究测试了对患有发展性语言障碍的双语儿童的重新治疗阿曼达·欧文·范·霍恩 (Amanda Owen Van Horne) 坐在地板上，而一个孩子则在玩具厨房里搅拌蛋糕糊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-tests-recast-therapy-for-bilingual-children-with-developmental-language-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Study-tests-recast-therapy-for-bilingual-children-with-developmental-language-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d604bcc-f87c-4277-a830-93ad91375006 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 21:28:27 -0400 Study tests recast therapy for bilingual children with developmental language disorder
GLS2 的铁死亡调节作为肝病的潜在治疗策略2023 年 10 月 19 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“GLS2 塑造肝细胞癌中的铁死亡”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Ferroptosis-regulation-of-GLS2-as-a-pottial-therapeutic-strategy-against-liver-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Ferroptosis-regulation-of-GLS2-as-a-pottial-therapeutic-strategy-against-liver-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e06a4566-35fb-4f85-930f-2c633902dd54 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 21:16:03 -0400 Ferroptosis regulation of GLS2 as a potential therapeutic strategy against liver diseases
类固醇的使用与高中运动员脑震荡风险增加有关研究人员表示，较高的体重指数和使用类固醇引起的攻击性增加可能会增加持续脑震荡的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Steroid-use-linked-to-increased-concussion-risk-in-high-school-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Steroid-use-linked-to-increased-concussion-risk-in-high-school-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7e54483-a6bf-40da-b703-61ec90e18373 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 21:10:53 -0400 Steroid use linked to increased concussion risk in high school athletes
参议员要求社会保障局就与新冠救济相关的回扣问题作出答复负责监督社会保障的小组的三名美国参议员呼吁社会保障管理局对一篇新闻报道做出回应，该报道称，人们的福利因收到了新冠肺炎 (covid-19) 救济金而被减少或暂停，这违反了该机构的政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Senators-demand-answers-from-Social-Security-on-clawbacks-tied-to-covid-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Senators-demand-answers-from-Social-Security-on-clawbacks-tied-to-covid-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83f4342b-e66c-4f5b-8a8b-1549a09e636f Thu, 19 Oct 2023 20:59:35 -0400 Senators demand answers from Social Security on clawbacks tied to covid relief
拜登当选美国国立卫生研究院院长终于迎来了她的日子，但仍陷入药品价格辩论参议院委员会最终于周三就总统乔·拜登挑选领导国立卫生研究院的问题举行了听证会。但该小组主席、佛蒙特州参议员伯尼·桑德斯 (Bernie Sanders) 将重点放在药品价格上，而美国国立卫生研究院对此几乎没有控制权。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Biden-pick-to-lead-NIH-finally-has-her-day-but-still-gets-caught-up-in-drug-price-辩论.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Biden-pick-to-lead-NIH-finally-has-her-day-but-still-gets-caught-up-in-drug-price-辩论.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a4e854c-397a-410f-9cea-a48ed5e87d21 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 20:56:17 -0400 Biden pick to lead NIH finally has her day, but still gets caught up in drug price debate
瘤内产生乳酸的细菌会导致对放射治疗的耐药性德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员发现，肿瘤内产生乳酸的细菌会导致对放射治疗的抵抗力，这表明存在于各种癌症中的产生乳酸的细菌可能作为新的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Lactate-having-intratumoral-bacteria-drive-resistance-to-radiation-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231019/Lactate-having-intratumoral-bacteria-drive-resistance-to-radiation-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75287280-c710-4300-93bf-c65785795529 Thu, 19 Oct 2023 13:44:01 -0400 Lactate-producing intratumoral bacteria drive resistance to radiation therapy
